Room.Name: Evander's Pawn Shop
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a secret room behind the Repair Shop.
Room.LongDescription: Buying back weapons is not looked upon highly by the great powers that be, especially if the items are stolen after a battle or other conquest. Nevertheless, Evander isn't one not to bend the rules. So, he'll try to give you an honest price for whatever it is you have to offer.
